code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomerForm=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',phone:'',address:''});const{name,email,phone,address}=formData;const onChange=e=>setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});const onSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/customers',formData);alert(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:name,onChange:onChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",value:email,onChange:onChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"phone",value:phone,onChange:onChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"address",value:address,onChange:onChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});};export default CustomerForm;
